text:
scanned every two weeks 
from 16 weeks onwards, 
and every four weeks if 
your babies have separate 
placentas. You are more likely 
to have a caesarean section 
but twins can sometimes be 
delivered vaginally. Your doctor 
should discuss this with you.
It is possible to breastfeed 
twins and triplets and there is 
more information about how 
you can do this in chapter 10. 
Advice on the care you might 
expect during pregnancy is 
available from the National 
Institute for Health and Care 
Excel
